title: kallAda Ezhai
sahitya:
kallAda Ezhai allavO evvAru unran
karuNai peruvEn sollammA


anupallavi

  kollAda mA tavam konDOr tozhum ninriruk-kOmaLa
 SEvadit-thAmaraiyil maDa manam aDangavE


caraNam    poyyan kolai sheyyum kuDikEDan punmozhiyADi perum kaLavADi veyyan
 koDiyan kuDiyan kEDi viDargaLil mun nADi mei anbu enbadu shiridum illAda
 vEDamiTTa ASADabhUti ena vaiyagattuLLOr vasaimozhi sholla mA dEvi nin uLLamum
 enaiyeLLa varuttam urubava bandhamunOigaLu dariddiramum mana vanmai azhikkak-
 karuttinin paripura nirmala pada kamalangaLai en-malangeDa-vaNangidak-
